function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High occupancy of built-up areas by car parking spaces","Impact":"Reduced space for other essential facilities, increased construction costs","Mitigation":"Implement smart design for multi-use of parking buildings","Technologies":"Smart parking systems, automated parking facilities","People":"Campus development planners, architects, construction engineers","Owner":"Campus development authorities, construction companies"},{"Description":"Contagious disease transmission in parking facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in enclosed parking areas","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation systems, regular cleaning and disinfection, promote use of open-air parking","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, cleaning and disinfection equipment","People":"Students, faculty, staff, visitors","Owner":"Campus management, facility maintenance team"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in parking spaces due to pandemic-related measures","Impact":"Potential for close contact and crowding in parking facilities, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement staggered parking schedules, designate spaced-out parking areas, promote alternative transportation methods","Technologies":"Smart parking systems, parking reservation apps, shuttle services","People":"Students, faculty, staff, visitors","Owner":"Campus management, parking management team"}]}
